search_2085_lusamine_family/6601_1201_02:
Clefairy seems to have gotten lost. Would you
mind coming with me to look for her?
search_2085_lusamine_family/6602_1201_01:
Clefairy had just about given up on waiting
for you.
search_2085_lusamine_family/6602_1201_03:
Unbelievable... I see your sense of direction is as
bad as ever.
search_2085_lusamine_family/6602_0301_04:
I guess it was actually you who was
lost, Lillie?
search_2085_lusamine_family/6602_0302_06: Try not to get lost again, Lillie.
search_2085_lusamine_family/6603_1201_02: Do you know any Pokémon that can make string?
search_2085_lusamine_family/6603_1201_03:
My clothes got ripped while I was training. Some
string should suffice for a quick fix.
search_2085_lusamine_family/6604_1201_01: All right. This should be enough.
search_2085_lusamine_family/6604_1201_04: I’ll fix your ripped clothes. Come here.
search_2085_lusamine_family/6604_0401_07: Hmph. It was no big deal.
search_2085_lusamine_family/6604_1201_10: I’m used to having a few rips in my outfit.
